<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Breath Blaster](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1165)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 154 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _breath blaster_ is a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [blunderbuss](/Weapons.aspx?ID=196)_ most commonly crafted from the trachea of a [dragon](/Traits.aspx?ID=50), though other creatures with breath weapons or the ability to spit energy are occasionally used. The implementation of the dragon's trachea allows the firearm to unleash a torrent of pure energy in the form of gouts of flame or bolts of electricity.

 A _breath blaster's_ Strikes deal either acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage, depending on the dragon type or other creature from which it was made, though it can otherwise be used like a normal blunderbuss. A _breath blaster_ also can be activated to fire a line of energy in a 30-foot line or 15-foot cone, chosen when it's created and typically corresponding to the shape of the breath weapon used by the type of dragon or creature from which the breath blaster was created.

 In theory, the foundational techniques required to create a _breath blaster_ would allow for other damage types, but such _breath blasters_ would require the trachea from the correct dragon or creature type and additional creation techniques, making such a _breath blaster_ rare rather than uncommon.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact ([evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)) **Frequency** once per minute;   **Effect** You fire the _breath blaster_, dealing 4d6 damage of the appropriate type in the appropriate area. Creatures in the area must attempt a DC 24 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save (or Fortitude save if the damage is poison).

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the trachea of a ritually hunted dragon or other creature with a breath weapon with the appropriate damage type and area (line or cone) for the _breath blaster_.

</column>

Breath Blaster

</column>

<title
level="2"

>
Breath Blaster (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 154 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 4,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 2

</row>

</column>

---

The _greater breath blaster's_ activation deals 6d6 damage and the DC is 31. It's a _+2 greater striking_ blunderbuss.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Breath Blaster (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 154 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 24,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 2

</row>

</column>

---

The _major breath blaster's_ activation deals 10d6 damage, the DC is 38, and the area increases to either a 60-foot line or a 30-foot cone, chosen when it's created. It's a _+3 greater striking blunderbuss_.
